languages.text: {n}Стоит приблизиться, как вы становитесь объектом всеобщего внимания — скорее раздраженно-скучающего, чем откровенно неприязненного.{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит приблизиться, как вы становитесь объектом всеобщего внимания — скорее раздраженно-скучающего, чем откровенно неприязненного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
{n}The guards seem poised to flee, but one question alone makes them hesitate: whose wrath should they fear more — the governor's or the strangers' right in front of them?{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
{n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你接近时，所有人的注意力都转移到了你的身上。就目前看来，他们看起来更像是心里憋着怒火，尚未流露纯粹的敌意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你接近时，所有人的注意力都转移到了你的身上。就目前看来，他们看起来更像是心里憋着怒火，尚未流露纯粹的敌意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto te acercas, todo el mundo te dirige su atención. Por ahora, su reacción parece más de irritación acumulada que de hostilidad abierta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto te acercas, todo el mundo te dirige su atención. Por ahora, su reacción parece más de irritación acumulada que de hostilidad abierta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaklaşmanla birlikte herkesin dikkati sana çevriliyor. Tepkileri, açık bir düşmanlıktan ziyade bastırılmış bir öfkeye benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaklaşmanla birlikte herkesin dikkati sana çevriliyor. Tepkileri, açık bir düşmanlıktan ziyade bastırılmış bir öfkeye benziyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくとすぐに、全員の注意があなたに向けられた。今のところ、彼らの反応は露骨な敵意というよりも、抑え込まれた苛立ちに近いものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくとすぐに、全員の注意があなたに向けられた。今のところ、彼らの反応は露骨な敵意というよりも、抑え込まれた苛立ちに近いものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À votre approche, toute l'attention se porte sur vous. Pour l'instant, leur réaction évoque davantage l'irritation contenue que la franche hostilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À votre approche, toute l'attention se porte sur vous. Pour l'instant, leur réaction évoque davantage l'irritation contenue que la franche hostilité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, ist die Aufmerksamkeit aller Anwesenden auf dich gerichtet. Allerdings gleicht ihre Reaktion eher angestauter Wut als offener Feindseligkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you approach, everyone's attention shifts to you. For now, their reaction feels closer to pent-up irritation than outright hostility.{/n}
